metadata.description: The official AI Skills marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: payloadcms-payload
plugins.description: Use when working with Payload CMS projects (payload.config.ts, collections, fields, hooks, access control, Payload API). Use when debugging validation errors, security issues, relationship queries, transactions, or hook behavior.

plugins.name: metabase-docs-review
plugins.description: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewing pull requests, files, or diffs containing documentation markdown files.
